body: "The sooner we recognize that our teens are having sex, the sooner we can start acting like conscientious parents": The Guyana Groove thinks that "where abstinence alone teaching has failed...learning about sexuality from parents is the answer."
original_body: "The sooner we recognize that our teens are having sex, the sooner we can start acting like conscientious parents": The Guyana Groove thinks that "where abstinence alone teaching has failed...learning about sexuality from parents is the answer."
title: Guyana: More Than Abstinence
